QuestData.Title: Survival of the Fattest
QuestData.Description: We're hard-up for supplies, stranger. With the black dragons raining destruction on what would be our hunting grounds, we have no way to get food.$b$bThe ogres to our southwest, however, have exactly what we need. Within their grotto you should find plenty of meat and crafting supplies.$b$bThey may put up a fight. Be on your guard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 pieces of Dustbelcher Meat and 10 sheets of Dustbelcher Silk.
QuestData.RewardText: I imagine those ogres weren't too much trouble for you. Here - some coin for your troubles.
